thread.title: Harold
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Harold

author: Harold
title: Harold
text: After going some place else three times with no resolution for tires that were not holding pressure, these professionals found the problem in a matter of minutes. Carmelo and James are great honest professionals who will go the extra mile to help and make sure you are well taken care of. I'm a very happy customer!!
